text: Is there a python module that will properly parse/unparse strings for using in shell commands?
I'm looking for the python analog to perl's String::ShellQuote::shell_quote:

code:
$ print String::ShellQuote::shell_quote("hello", "stack", "overflow's", "quite", "cool")
hello stack 'overflow'\''s' quite cool

text: And, even more importantly, something which will work in the reverse direction (take a string and decompose it into a list).
